title: Review: All-new Ortlieb Handlebar Pack QR easily hauls bikepacking gear in all weather
content:
Ortlieb’s new waterproof Handlebar Pack QR makes packing for adventures easier than ever, reimagining a classic touring bar bag bracket for quick release on & off your bikepacking bike. Sustainably made in Germany, like everything Ortlieb the Handlebar Pack QR will keep your gear dry no matter how bad the weather gets, and has room […]

The post Review: All-new Ortlieb Handlebar Pack QR easily hauls bikepacking gear in all weather appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
